_comment: Configuration file for Prop-Maker Feather Crow Bird
_description: Modify these settings to customize your bird's behavior. Save and reset board for changes to take effect.

pins._note: Servo and audio use built-in hardware - no pin config needed

sensors._threshold_note: 0-65535, higher = need more light to activate. with 2000ohms resistance, very dark gives ~300, light around 6000

servo._speed_note: Delay between steps in seconds - lower = faster

_presets._description: Copy these values to main config for different behaviors
